mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, QS_BD_NUM as qna_bd_num, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_DATE as qna_date, QS_CNT as qna_cnt, QS_LIKE_CNT as qna_like_yn, u.USER_ID FROM T_BEDU_QS q left join T_BEDU_USER u ON q.USER_NAME = u.USER_ID ORDER BY QS_BD_NUM DESC) WHERE rnum >= #{page} AND #{limit} >= rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_QS( QS_BD_NUM, USER_NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT, QS_LIKE_CNT, QS_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( BEDU_QS.NEXTVAL, #{user_name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{qna_cnt}, #{qna_like_yn}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qna_bd_num, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT AS qna_cnt, QS_LIKE_CNT AS qna_like_yn, QS_DATE AS qna_date, REG_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_NUM FROM T_BEDU_QS q LEFT JOIN T_BEDU_USER u ON q.USER_NAME = u.USER_ID WHERE QS_BD_NUM = #{num}

SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qna_bd_num, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_NAME, QS_CNT AS qna_cnt, QS_LIKE_CNT AS qna_like_yn, QS_DATE AS qna_date, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_QS
WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
